Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Randall Ochmann
Reviews.Content: The MacBook was in very good condition. At the price I paid,I didn't expect it to be perfect. Fast i7 processor, especially after putting in an SSD and 16GB of RAM. Boots Mavericks in 25 seconds. No regrets at all with this MacBook.

ProductInfo.Features:
Part # MC721LL/A
Intel Quad-Core i7-2635QM 2.00GHz - 4GB DDR3 - 500GB HDD
8x slot-loading SuperDrive with double-layer DVD support - AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256MB dedicated video memory and Intel HD Graphics 3000 graphics - 15.4" (1440x900)
802.11a/g/n - Bluetooth - Webcam - Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
(2) USB 2.0 - (1)Firewire 800Port - Thunderbolt port - Headphone - Microphone
ProductInfo.Name: Apple MacBook Pro MC721LL/A i7-2635QM 2.00GHz - 4GB - 500GB HDD - DVD±RW - AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256MB video - 15.4-inch
